title: Jewel Cave National Monument: Sustainability
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Sustainability            Sustainability            Modified Environmental Management System / Climate Friendly Parks Plans This Modified Environmental Management System (MEMS) / Climate Friendly Parks (CFP) Plan 2013 was developed by Jewel Cave National Monument's "Green Team", whose role is to guide sustainability projects, encourage green practices, and educate the staff and public. The Green Team sets annual sustainability goals and reports progress to park management.
